ptolemy.homer.kernel

Class LayoutParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptolemy.homer.kernel.LayoutParser

  • public class LayoutParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Parse the layout XML file for tabs, screen orientation, and individual sink actor placement properties.
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 10.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Justin Killian
    Accepted Rating:
    Red (jkillian)
    Proposed Rating:
    Red (jkillian)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  LayoutParser.ScreenOrientation
      The different screen orientations possible for the visual representation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LayoutParser(CompositeEntity topLevelActor)
      Parse the layout XML file so that the screen display can be set up according to the user's preferences.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LayoutParser.ScreenOrientation getOrientation()
      Get the orientation of the screen from the parsed layout file.

      Get the attributes with positions defined in the layout file.
      java.util.HashSet<NamedObj> getPositionableElements()
      Return all elements in the model that has its positions defined.

      Get the entities with positions defined.

      Return all the elements in the model marked as proxies.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LayoutParser

        public LayoutParser(CompositeEntity topLevelActor)
        Parse the layout XML file so that the screen display can be set up according to the user's preferences.
        Parameters:
        topLevelActor - Top-level actor of the parsed model file.

    • Method Detail

      • getOrientation

        public LayoutParser.ScreenOrientation getOrientation()
        Get the orientation of the screen from the parsed layout file.
        Returns:
        The screen orientation (if defined by the layout).

      • getTabDefinitions

        public java.util.ArrayList<TabDefinition> getTabDefinitions()
                                                     throws IllegalActionException,
                                                            NameDuplicationException
        Get the parsed tabs defined in the layout file.
        Returns:
        All the tabs parsed, or null if no tabs were defined.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - If a tab description is incorrect
        NameDuplicationException - If there's an error setting the style due to naming issues.

      • getPositionableEntities

        public java.util.ArrayList<EntityElement> getPositionableEntities()
                                                           throws IllegalActionException
        Get the entities with positions defined.
        Returns:
        All the entities with positions parsed.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - If an entity does not implement PortablePlaceable or if the location information is invalid for any of the entities.

      • getPositionableAttributes

        public java.util.ArrayList<AttributeElement> getPositionableAttributes()
                                                                throws IllegalActionException
        Get the attributes with positions defined in the layout file.
        Returns:
        All the attributes with locations parsed.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - If the location information is invalid for any of the attributes, or if the attribute is not Settable.

      • getProxyElements

        public java.util.HashSet<NamedObj> getProxyElements()
        Return all the elements in the model marked as proxies.
        Returns:
        The set of all named objects marked as proxies.

      • getPositionableElements

        public java.util.HashSet<NamedObj> getPositionableElements()
        Return all elements in the model that has its positions defined.
        Returns:
        The set of all named objects with position information.

      • isPositionable

        public static boolean isPositionable(NamedObj node)
        Return true if the node has location defined.
        Parameters:
        node - The named object to check.
        Returns:
        True if the node has location defined, false otherwise.
